channel.title: Client not connecting
channel.description:
Hey guys tanks for reading this.
Ok, so im using Demise pk source and client so i went ahead and coded it and what not then i get some ppl to download the client and they try and loggin and it says sorry loading char file try again so they do and nothin (p.s it also dosnt show them connecting on the server cmd thingy) so i told one to try it on mopar scape, so he changed the ip and it worked kinda it logged him in then out immediately (p.s this time it did show up on the server cmd that he was connecting) so how do i get my client to connect? i do have a EGUI with the ip in it.

item.title: Client not connecting
item.dc:creator: @24jared24 24jared24
item.description:
@24jared24 wrote:
